original_title: Москва Раевского: Пожар 1812 года. История вранья, глупости и жестокости
overview: Who promised Muscovites that the war of 1812 would not affect them? How was it punished for retelling news to friends in the XIX century? How did Napoleon and the French behave in captured Moscow? And the main question is: who really burned Moscow?
title: Raevsky's Moscow: Fire 1812: Story of Lies, Idiocy and Cruelty
